name: SILENT LEGES INTER ARMA - Silent Leges Inter Arma + Synästhesie, Slipcase 2CD
description: PRE-ORDER ! CD will ship upon release. Full length album, out October 12th via Eisenwald. Slipcase edition, 270 copies made. Includes the album as digipack w/ booklet and the "Synästhesie" MCD from 2009 as bonus inside a cardsleeve. All executed with black cartone/paper and fine gold inks. Tracklist "Silent Leges Inter Arma": 1. We Are 2. Falcon-Headed One 3. I Will Hunt You Down 4. Beyond The Light 5. Shades 6. For The Dead 7. Wings 8. In Shadows Again Tracklist "Synästhesie": 1. Ruthless Aggression 2. In shadows 3. Silence again 4 . Journey ALBUM TEASER available via Youtube ! Please view, like and spread !
